Question
========

We take a sample of 7 individuals from a large population and measure their body temperature in degrees Celsius, with the results being 37.6, 37.1, 38.0, 37.5, 36.9, 37.1, 37.3. This variable is measured on a

Answerlist
----------

* Discrete interval scale
* Continuous interval scale
* Discrete ratios scale
* Continuous ratios scale

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Discrete interval scale: Incorrect
* Continuous interval scale: Correct
* Discrete ratios scale: Incorrect
* Continuous ratios scale: Incorrect
